title: Project Kickoff Discussion
author: Sarah Chen
initialMessage: Welcome everyone! Let's use this thread to discuss our project goals and timeline. Please share your thoughts on the initial requirements.

title: Design System Updates
author: Mike Johnson
initialMessage: I've updated our design system with new color palettes and typography scales. The components library has been refreshed accordingly.

title: Weekly Team Sync
author: Emily Davis
initialMessage: Time for our weekly sync! Please share your progress, blockers, and what you're planning for the upcoming week.

title: Bug Report: Login Issues
author: Alex Rodriguez
initialMessage: Users are reporting login issues on mobile devices. The authentication seems to fail intermittently. Has anyone else noticed this?

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
author: Jessica Wong
initialMessage: Several users have requested a dark mode option. This could improve accessibility and user experience. What are your thoughts on implementation?
